disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 1 May to end of Sunday 1 May GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Largely cloudy conditions for Sunday as the wind direction changes from the north-easterly of late to a south-westerly. Little imported pollution is expected on this path and, although winds will be very light, there should still be adequate dispersion of local emissions.<br/>     <br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 2 May to end of Tuesday 3 May GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Settled but largely cloudy weather is forecast to continue on Monday and Tuesday. <br/><br/>Although winds will be light, there should be enough air movement to disperse local emissions, while there'll be little by way of imported pollution.<br/>  <br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>
